QuestData.Title: The Deserters
QuestData.Description: It has been a struggle maintaining a presence in the marsh, but through strength of our resolve, we have been able to maintain several defensive watchtowers throughout the area.$b$bThe latest information and scouting reports I have received indicate that a group of deserters has squatted in our abandoned tower at Lost Point, southeast of the inn.$b$bThe local lieutenant seems to be Balos Jacken. See if you can get some information out of him.$b$bBe warned, $n. He may be a tough nut to crack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get information about Reethe from Balos Jacken and the deserters in Dustwallow Marsh.
QuestData.RewardText: Did Vimes send you? Couldn't do his dirty work himself, could he...
